articles.title: Voyager 2: Nasa loses contact with record-breaking probe after sending wrong command - BBC
articles.description: A signal sent in error left Voyager 2's antenna tilting the wrong way, severing contact with Earth.
articles.content:
Nasa has lost contact with its Voyager 2 probe billions of miles away from Earth after mistakenly severing contact with it, the space agency has revealed.
